LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_InitialMessage:
After a visit from your friends from {1}, you noticed that {0} lost an old piece of parchment. After a closer inspection you think that this might be a treasure map.

Do you want to go on a treasure hunt?
There may be something good to be found.
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_InitialMessageRejecte: You don't give much to old pieces of parchment and burn it up.
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_SelectPawnsMessage: Select colonists to send to the location marked on the map.\nCAUTION: They will be gone for round about {0} days!
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_ButtonAssignError: You can't send everyone. Someone needs to watch over the colony!
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_ButtonSendError: Can't send. Noone assigned to go.
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_Message_ReturnedBase: Your team returned from the treasure map location.
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_Message_ReturnedNoTre: They found some overgrown hills and what looks like a promising iron mining site, but for a treasure map it was a huge disappointment.
LanguageData.RumorOfTreasureMap_Message_ReturnedWithT: They found some overgrown hills and a nice alley with a small stream.\nAfter an excessive search with help of the map your team found a buried chest. In there was a note, mentioning some smuggling group, and also the real treasure. They returned with..
